description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国共产党上海市委员会副书记，上海市人民政府市长、党组书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee and the Mayor of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任上海市委书记、浙江省省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who has served as the Party Secretary of Shanghai and Governor of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任上海市委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，龚正的前任上海市市长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Gong Zheng's predecessor as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 山东省的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任山东省委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as the Party Secretary of Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，龚正的前任山东省省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Gong Zheng's predecessor as Governor of Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，龚正的继任山东省省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Gong Zheng's successor as Governor of Shandong Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在杭州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Hangzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾在龚正担任杭州市委书记期间任副书记兼市长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Secretary and Mayor of Hangzhou while Gong Zheng was the Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，龚正的前任杭州市委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Gong Zheng's predecessor as Party Secretary of Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，龚正的继任杭州市委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Gong Zheng's successor as Party Secretary of Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾在龚正担任浙江省副省长期间任省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Governor of Zhejiang while Gong Zheng was Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾在龚正担任浙江省副省长期间任省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Governor of Zhejiang while Gong Zheng was Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省的地级市，龚正的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Gong Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 龚正的妻子，刘植岩之女，刘鹤同父异母的妹妹。
description.en: Gong Zheng's wife, daughter of Liu Zhiyan, and half-sister of Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的教育部直属全国重点大学。
description.en: A national key university in Beijing, China, directly under the Ministry of Education.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训学校。
description.en: The cadre training school directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Xiamen, Fujian Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2017年至2022年间的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China from 2017 to 2022.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党自2022年起的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China since 2022.

nodes.id: 中国共产党山东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的省会。龚正曾在此担任市委书记。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province. Gong Zheng once served as the Party Secretary here.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的正部级直属机构，主管全国海关工作。
description.en: A ministry-level agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national customs work.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的一所私立大学，龚正曾在此进修。
description.en: A private university in the United States where Gong Zheng undertook advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海关总署署长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as the Director of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国设在天津市的海关机构。
description.en: The customs authority of the People's Republic of China located in Tianjin.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，时任台北市市长。
description.en: A political figure in the Republic of China, serving as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 由台北市与上海市轮流举办的年度城市交流论坛。
description.en: An annual city exchange forum held alternately by Taipei and Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，刘茶与刘鹤之父。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China, father of Liu Cha and Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理，是刘茶的同父异母兄长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. He is the half-brother of Liu Cha.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副总理职位。
description.en: The position of Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国深圳海关

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国深圳海关

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国设在深圳市的海关机构。
description.en: The customs authority of the People's Republic of China located in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 参加一年制中青年干部培训班学习。
description.en: Attended the one-year training program for young and middle-aged cadres.

description.zh-cn: 龚正作为国家教委出国访问学者，赴美国金门大学进修公共管理专业。
description.en: As a visiting scholar sponsored by the State Education Commission, Gong Zheng went to Golden Gate University in the United States for advanced studies in public administration.

position.zh-cn: 干部、副处长、秘书、副主任、副司长、政策法规司司长、副署长
position.en: Cadre, Deputy Division Chief, Secretary, Deputy Director, Deputy Director-General, Director-General of the Department of Policies and Regulations, Deputy Commissioner

position.zh-cn: 海关总署署长办公室正处级秘书
position.en: Director-level Secretary in the Office of the Director-General of the General Administration of Customs
Deputy Commissioner, Member of the Party Leadership Group

description.en: While Gong Zheng was the Party Secretary of Hangzhou, Zhang Hongming served as the Deputy Secretary and Mayor.

position.en: Deputy Secretary, President of the Provincial Party School

description.en: While Gong Zheng was the Governor of Shandong Province, Liu Jiayi served as the Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任上海市市长期间，李强任市委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng served as Mayor of Shanghai, Li Qiang was the Municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任上海市市长期间，陈吉宁任市委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng serves as Mayor of Shanghai, Chen Jining is the Municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 在上海台北双城论坛上会面并握手。
description.en: Met and shook hands at the Shanghai-Taipei City Forum.

description.zh-cn: 刘茶是刘鹤同父异母的妹妹。
description.en: Liu Cha is Liu He's half-sister.

description.zh-cn: 刘鹤是第十九届中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Liu He was a member of the 19th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.
